tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImagingData (
  patient_id INT,
  time_point_1_data TEXT,
  time_point_2_data TEXT,
  treatment_effectiveness BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE imaging_data_comparison (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_path_1 VARCHAR(255),
    image_path_2 VARCHAR(255),
    time_point_1 DATE,
    time_point_2 DATE,
    treatment_effectiveness_1 FLOAT,
    treatment_effectiveness_2 FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientDetails (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  treatment_started_date DATE
);
